minecraft:emitter_initialization.creation_expression: v.wlarwhb = 3; v.svtfpiu = 0; v.efccfwg = 8/20; v.tgtynne = v.tgtynne??1; v.mdtwbki = v.mdtwbki??1; v.jfrmxjg = v.jfrmxjg??1; v.cxpqszt = v.cxpqszt??0.5; v.hahlhow=v.hahlhow??0; v.pegfumj=v.pegfumj??0; v.rgztdom=v.rgztdom??0; v.ucbteoy=v.ucbteoy??0; v.chcvwqs=v.chcvwqs??0; v.pkzkfjf=v.pkzkfjf??0; v.brtepfb = v.brtepfb??1; v.mjxejye = v.mjxejye??1;

color: v.wlarwhb ? {return 0;} : 0; t.ptfylby = v.cxpqszt*math.hermite_blend(1-math.clamp((v.particle_age-v.smymsra)/v.efccfwg, 0, 1)); t.ptfylby=(t.ptfylby-v.cxpqszt)/(t.ptfylby-1); t.lonhuhh = v.smymsra + v.efccfwg + v.svtfpiu; return v.particle_age>t.lonhuhh?v.cxpqszt*math.hermite_blend(1 - math.clamp((v.particle_age-t.lonhuhh)/v.efccfwg, 0, 1)):t.ptfylby;
